t: Grey Poupon - Wikipedia
s: 3 weeks ago - Grey Poupon (French: [pupɔ̃]) is a brand of Dijon mustard which originated in Dijon, France, in 1866. The U.S. rights to the brand were acquired by the Heublein Company in 1946, later passing on to Kraft Foods.
